title: Antigravity vs Labellerr Video: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Labellerr Video. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Labellerr Video? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Labellerr Video
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2025 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Labellerr Video (computer vision) is Labellerr Video is a specialized computer vision data annotation platform designed to accelerate the creation of high-quality training datasets for video and image models. It leverages AI-powered auto-labeling, active learning workflows, and robust quality control tools to reduce manual annotation time by up to 90%. The platform uniquely targets enterprise teams and AI developers who need scalable, secure, and collaborative annotation pipelines with integrated project management.. Users choose it for video-annotation, auto-labeling, data-labeling-platform.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code

Labellerr Video: AI-assisted pre-labeling for objects, segmentation, and tracking in video, Frame-by-frame and interpolated video annotation tools, Active learning pipeline to prioritize the most valuable frames for review

verdict: Both Antigravity and Labellerr Video are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Labellerr Video for video-annotation.
